website_summaries.verdict: This is a great way to start introducing your child to solid foods, and it has some of the tastiest veggie-only pouches on the market.
pros: Certified organic and made with non-GMO ingredients
Veggie-only pouches that give your baby nutrients without all the sugars found in fruits
cons: Some customers say the texture is too watery and others say it is too thick

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and low calorie
customer_reviews.text: Just delicious. Got these for myself. I have a condition with digestion, (Gastroparesis) and sometimes I want a snack before 3pm, and I have one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Naynay

customer_reviews.title: 🍌 🥣
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved it! She is a huge fan of blueberries! She also needed the extra fiber content which helped immensely. I expected the texture to be thicker or grainy and it was not.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super fast
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! They are especially great since we have lack of fresh fruit during this time of quarantine! They arrived so fast it was almost scary...like idk how it made it here in less than 24 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good product, inconsistent delivery of product
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is awesome, kids love it even at age 5 - we have had this on subscribe and save for a couple of years now. We just had a problem with the fact that one exploded en route in our last order... I've also had instances where there were only 5 pouches per box instead of 6, only one box of six were delivered instead of two, etc. Overall, I can't complain about the product, just inconsistent with what I get with each delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Ralap Julius

customer_reviews.title: The key is flax and not too high sugar content!
customer_reviews.text: This has flax which helps my baby go to the bathroom if she cant go well. Even at 1 1/2 years old she still likes these from time to time, and they are easy to travel with for a quick snack for her. She seems to love this brand and flavor so we keep getting them and keep them as backup if there is nothing else to eat. IF this didnt have flax and the sugar was too high i wouldnt buy it but it has flax and sugar is not too high so i keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: the Guru

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this stuff! She gets very excited when she sees it come out of the box or my purse. I've tasted it and find the flavor very pleasant. My DD used to enjoy having someone squeeze this right into her mouth but now she's figured out how to slurp it up all by herself. The only down side is that it's very blue and tends to get all over, but it washes out fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves these
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these pouches and I feel good about giving them to her because the ingredients are simple and train her to like fruit and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY YUMMY YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: BEST BEST QUALITY - NO EARTH'S BEST FOOD HAS EVER BEEN REJECTED BY MY GRANDSON OR MY GREATGRANDCHILDREN (TWINS) Delicious and you know you are getting the absolute safest best food. AND the pouches are SO convenient - and babies (at a certain stage) will be able to hold themselves. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: The kids like them
customer_reviews.text: My kids (4 and 1) love these. I like them for a quick breakfast when needed or a snack to keep in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: BagLady

customer_reviews.title: Babies love this for breakfast and in bottle!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month year old gets angry if I dont feed this to him fast enough. He loves loves loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kc Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I could easily eat these away from my baby lol
customer_reviews.text: Taste is of the chain. I could easily eat these away from my baby lol. He loves these. Eats an entire one in one go
customer_reviews.author: Kenesha

customer_reviews.title: Not so yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Baby did not like the flavor! But I love the pouch style for feeding!!!
customer_reviews.author: angelap

customer_reviews.title: Favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves these. His favorite flavor. This brand has proved to be less messy also. My baby doesn’t seem to squeeze it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: A HH

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy to my son
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's favorite packets. He had to do a double take since they changed the packaging but is still very happy with it. He is 22 months and loves these for breakfast
customer_reviews.author: LauraJ

customer_reviews.title: InMyOpinion
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this flavor. He will eat it for breakfast and as a snack. My son is picky so the flavors are not tangy or too strong.
customer_reviews.author: InMyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Daughter eats at least one a day. Great substitute for those not willing to eat plate versions of fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Rob mich

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, my son gobbles them up. Nice to see flax and grains such as quinoa in some of these foods. These are a go-to for us when nothing else will do.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves these pouches
customer_reviews.text: My picky 20-month-old loves these as part of breakfast or a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Anthropod

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: child likes it (10 mo) , i like it, works out for everyone like buying a 12 pack for a better deal
customer_reviews.author: Ava K Lamb

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves these-they have a great mix of grains and fruit
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these-they have a great mix of grains and fruit. They are perfect for busy mornings or snacks.
customer_reviews.author: ensrn12

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves this flavor, I'm happy with ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this flavor and I'm happy with the ingredients as it appears healthy and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: B.Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for mother on the go with a little one! We've enjoyed these from 9mos - 2 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caution the damaged rim before feeding baby!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I was a high loyalty customer of Earth's Best organic baby food with Amazon subscription every month. However, I was so disappointed with their product today! Today, I gave one pouch for my 11 months baby. After he finished, I found the rim is damaged, as attached photo. I was scared and opened another one. I can't believed it's also damaged and so sharp. I was so guilty that I did not notice the broken rim before giving it to kids. :(
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lai

customer_reviews.title: If they hadn't changed the packaging and color then it ...
customer_reviews.text: If they hadn't changed the packaging and color then it would get 5 stars. My son now thinks it's not the same as when it was in a blueish pouch and won't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: GT Family

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor
customer_reviews.text: All of my kids have loved this flavor the best and I feel good about the brand so we buy it quite a bit. I even like this one as an occasional treat! (It's very good!)
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Less than one dollar for organic baby food pouches? Banana blueberry oatmeal flavor. Unheard of! Thank you for this amazing deal! They are 1.29-2.00 in my area, which adds up when my boys tend to eat 6-8 per day.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love the simple, pure ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pouches! And I feel good giving them to him because of the honest, pure ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Higgins

customer_reviews.title: One of the better earth's best flavors
customer_reviews.text: One of the better earth's best flavors. My baby loves this one and can devour 2 packages in a sitting. He's been eating these since he was around 8 months old. A great quick snack or breakfast when you're short in time.
customer_reviews.author: Kona K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so good I wanted to eat them myself!
customer_reviews.author: NewParents

product_meta.title: Earth's Best Organic Stage 2 Baby Food, Banana Blueberry Breakfast, 4 oz. Pouch (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Banana Blueberry BreakfastEarth’s Best Organic Baby Food Pouches feature yummy combinations of pureed fruits, veggies, meat and whole grains that your little one is sure to love. With multiple stages of purees available for different ages, there's an Earth's Best baby food for every step along the way. Simply choose the appropriate puree based on your baby's age: Stage 2 is for little ones 6 months and older, and Stage 3 is for 9 months and older. Packaged in BPA-free resealable pouches, Earth's Best baby food is perfect for on-the-go families. All Earth’s Best baby food pouches are USDA-Certified Organic, made with non-GMO ingredients, and contain no artificial flavors, or colors. They are also unsweetened, unsalted, and have no added modified starches. From the day that Earth’s Best was founded in 1985, we’ve been recognized as a brand dedicated to offering wholesome, safe products for little ones. We believe that babies deserve nutritious fruits handpicked from organic orchards, vegetables grown in nature’s soil, and foods that are made without genetically engineered ingredients. Offering a wide range of safe and gentle baby care products as well as nourishing foods, Earth's Best products are created with care, using simple ingredients found in nature. Made with love from the ground up, you can trust Earth’s Best products to be safe for your baby.

BRAND STORY
By Earth's Best
feature_bullets: Twelve 4 oz. pouches of Earth's Best Organic Stage 2 Banana Blueberry Breakfast Puree Baby Food
USDA-Certified Organic and made with non-GMO ingredients

For babies 6 months and older^Made with quinoa, barley, oat & flax^No artificial flavors, colors or preservatives^USDA Organic certified^Convenient, squeezable, resealable, non-BPA package; serve within 24 hours of opening

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
